description: In this course, you will learn the fundamentals to using Hootsuite to manage your various social media accounts. This is a great tool for anyone managing social media for a company or organization, or for anyone that has a large amount of personal social media accounts. First, you will be taught how to set up a free Hoosuite account, as well as how to install your current and future social networks. Then, you will be instructed on how to post and schedule posts using the program, how to utilize the analytic tools built into the program to measure your social media success, and how to use other great features of the program.
title: How to Use Hootsuite for Social Media Management
